column1: https://homestars.com/on/middleport/fireplaces,5,https://homestars.com/on/middleport/fireplaces,Fireplaces,207769,http://gasfix.ca/,/companies/207769-gas-fix?searched_category_id=357&service_area=1806044,"GASFIX has been solving problems since 1982, servicing those areas from Grimsby to Etobicoke. Our factory trained technicians specialize in the repair and maintenance of gas fireplaces and pool heaters of all makes and models. We also service furnaces, water heaters and can install gas lines for all your requirements. Contact us today for a quote!
Gas fireplaces that Gas Fix services though not limited to this list include:
At Gas Fix, we recommend an annual “clean and check” to your gas fireplace.
A clean & check service call to your gas fireplace includes:

column2: Blowing out both the burner and the pilot assembly with an air compressor
Testing the pilot sensor - Thermopile / Thermocouple
Checking the safety on the gas valve
Doing a draft test on the ventilation and a carbon monoxide test
Checking the fireplace on start up

column1: Our technicians do carry over 300 of the most common gas fireplace parts with them enabling them to provide same day service on your gas fireplace.
Gas pool heaters that Gas Fix services:
A light and check service call to your gas pool heater includes:

column2: Checking for spiders in burner orifices

column1: A clean and check to a Gas Furnace includes:

column2: Check filter for replacement or upgrade options
Check all wires for damage and state of repair
Check all hoses for connections, cracks and past or present water leaks
Visual camera inspection inside duct work on A coil (AC) and heat exchanger
Heat rise calculation and compare to manufacturer’s specifications
Full carbon monoxide test of air ducts and venting
Full air compressor cleaning and vacuuming to ensure product runs smoothly

https://homestars.com/on/middleport/fireplaces,5,https://homestars.com/on/middleport/fireplaces,Fireplaces,2800376,http://www.stoneselex.com,/companies/2800376-stone-selex?searched_category_id=357&service_area=1962976,"Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces

From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction.

Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations.

Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone.

Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers.

If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you.
